meanings.definition: A person who rides a bicycle.
meanings.sent1: The group of cyclers rode their bikes through the park.
meanings.sent2: Many cyclers enjoy biking on the weekends for exercise.
meanings.sent3: The cyclers in the race were determined to reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent4: She was a cycler of emotions, pedaling through highs and lows.
meanings.sent5: The cyclers whizzed past, a blur of colors on wheels.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that cycles or rotates.
meanings.sent1: The factory had large cyclers that moved materials along the production line.
meanings.sent2: The cyclers in the gym helped people stay fit and healthy.
meanings.sent3: The little robot cycler kept spinning in circles, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: The cycler of the washing machine hummed as it cleaned the clothes.
meanings.sent5: The cycler in the clock ticked steadily, marking the passage of time.
